text: @realDonaldTrump More lies: WHO inform world leaders on January 5 2020 of possible Coronavirus . Oh...Trump did not get the  memo he was occupied at Mar-a-Lago on another vacation playing golf and having dinner parties with the rich and famous. So blame WHO for 35,000 Americans dead ..not Trump.
